info.Environment:
iPhone 11 16.4.1 Safari Windows 10 Home Chrome 112 Win 11 Pro Chrome 112 MacOS Monterey 12.6.5 Chrome 112 HTML img srcset of all images on Glossary page is set as 600x300. All images include invalid image sources.
1. Navigate to capital.com 2. Hover over the [Education] menu section 3. Click on [Glossary of trading terms] item 4. Click on any Glossary term, e.g. [Accounting Ratio] 5. Open devtools and look at the image element img srcset 6. Examples of cropped img src here.
The image srcset is set as e.g. 800x600, as a result the image content on page is fully visible The image srcset is set as 600x300, as a result the image content on page is not fully visible Link All All @ida_quetzalcoatl
